message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a fantastic deal and worth every penny.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents the value I place on it, I'm willing to come down to $130. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
